thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com
thread.title: Carmen Martinez

author: Carmen Martinez
title: Carmen Martinez
text: I love their products and their good intentions with their treatments and this why I am a client but I do have to say that Customer service it's not adequate or even to separate them from cavernicols , Tim half way the treatment and this last February the 5th was my first time I was actually in the appointment , nobody called me to reschedule and this time they say hi , very impressed
